title: Interpretation of a dream about a blue snake in the house in a dream

Interpretation of a dream about a blue snake in the house in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a snake in the house in a dream can indicate enemies from your relatives and God knows best However, seeing a blue snake can lead to benefits for the dreamer and God has knowledge of the unseen If a married woman sees a blue snake in the house, it may indicate enemies from relatives and God knows best Likewise, if a divorced woman sees a blue snake in a dream, it may indicate enemies from your relatives, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a large snake coming out of the water, this may be a sign of her ability to get rid of problems and confront them, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. If the dreamer sees a large snake coming out of the water in a dream, this may indicate a supernatural power, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees scorpion venom, it can lead to obscene words, and God knows best. Also, seeing scorpion venom can represent bad friends, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl is seen cutting the snake into In half, it may lead to victory Just as cutting a snake in half can express insulting the enemy, and God has all knowledge. When a married woman sees a snake biting her leg, it may lead to what she does of bad deeds, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a snake biting his leg in a dream, this may be evidence of committing sins. When you see a snake biting your leg in a dream, it may express the following desire, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about removing snake venom from his mouth in a dream. title: What is the interpretation of henna in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: What the jurists said about interpreting henna in a dream: Henna is one of the symbols that carries dozens of associations, so we decided on an Egyptian website to devote this article to it and discuss it in detail, and present the most important things that senior officials said about it. A suitable interpretation of your dream. Henna in a dream. Jurists differed in the interpretation of henna in a dream. Ibn Shaheen said that it is one of the sad symbols that warn the dreamer of the coming distress, but God erases it from his life. Because if henna is applied to the body, the skin is painted for a temporary period and then its color disappears, and thus the dreamer’s life will be bleak, for days, weeks, perhaps a few months, and then it becomes clear again. If the dreamer sees henna in his dream in a dish or bowl without putting it in his hand, This indicates an abundance of money, and the greater the amount that is placed in the pot, the more the dreamer will have in the future. If the dreamer sees a bag full of henna in his dream, then this bag is a metaphor for keeping money in his life, and filling it with henna is interpreted as an increase in the dreamer’s benevolence. As for Al-Nabulsi, he placed different meanings on the appearance of henna in a dream and said that the dreamer who dreams of applying it to his body or hair will be one of those who memorize the Sunnah of the Prophet in its smallest details. Also, the dream has omens of happiness and the abundance of God’s blessings upon him in terms of a lot of money and good offspring, and these blessings will make The dreamer feels that he possesses the adornments of the world, as the Lord of the Worlds said in... His holy book (Money and children are the jewel of life in the world). If it were in the form of henna, the one who wears it would be satisfied. It is a sign of empowerment in the dreamer’s life so that he can unify his goals and desires, and this is one of the means of achieving happiness in his life. The heart and his family. If the dreamer sees his hair turning white even though he is young and awake, and places parts of soft henna on his head until the white hair is dyed and hidden, here the dream is interpreted in two meanings: or not: white hair is a metaphor for the dreamer’s lack of money and his feeling of dryness. Secondly: Applying henna to this hair indicates that the dreamer is hiding the details of his life, as he does not tell anyone that he has become poor and is in dire need of money. If the dreamer takes a piece of henna and paints it on his face, this will be a disgrace to him and his reputation will be affected wherever he goes. And if the Virgin sees that she She paints henna on her face in a dream until she becomes beautiful in appearance. God will increase her coming days with goodness and happiness, and she may experience a new event or situation that will make her happy. , such as a wedding or a long-awaited travel opportunity. If the dreamer sees in a dream dry henna powder and puts an amount of water on it until it becomes a cohesive mixture and is used successfully, then he is making a plan for a project in his life and will achieve it. God willing, because the henna mixture was not spoiled in the vision. Interpretation of washing henna from the hand in a dream: If henna covered the dreamer’s hand from beginning to end and he saw that he was removing it until the features of his hand appeared clearly, then the meaning of the dream is that he was hiding all his secrets in his life because he was applying henna. In all his hand, removing it shows the exposure of many of his private life issues, he is weak and humiliated when

In all his hand, removing it shows the exposure of many of his private life issues, he is weak and humiliated when

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sheep in a dream, meanings of a black sheep in a dream for a single married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, the meaning of a dead sheep, seeing a slaughtered sheep, the interpretation of hunting sheep, the symbol of burning sheep, sheep is a term that means sheep, goats, and ewes in reality, but when you see a sheep running away in a dream Or a dream about sheep for a dead person will inevitably have many meanings and signs that we will learn from the explanation of sheep. In a dream in detail in this article. Interpretation of a dream about sheep by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream, as mentioned by Ibn Sirin, is evidence of an increase in good offspring, an abundance of provisions, and much goodness. Dreaming of sheep in a dream also indicates health, well-being, body strength, longevity, and the fulfillment of desires and aspirations. Seeing a sheep slaughtered in a dream is a desirable vision. It is a sign of goodness, livelihood, and goodness for me. He has earned a lot of money. Dreaming of seeing a sheep slaughtered in a dream indicates receiving good news, the return of the absent, and the disappearance of anxiety and sadness. Seeing a white sheep in a dream is evidence However, the dreamer will perform Hajj and Umrah and visit the Sacred Mosque soon. Interpretation of a dream about sheep by Al-Nabulsi: Interpretation of a dream about a small sheep in a dream, as Imam Al-Nabulsi indicated that it indicates the imminent birth of a male for pregnancy for those who have not yet given birth. Seeing a large sheep in a dream is a sign that ambitions It has come true and that good luck will be the fortuneteller’s ally. The dream of a black sheep in a dream shows the abundance of goodness, blessings, breadth of sustenance, and success from Almighty God in what the dreamer seeks. The dream of seeing a white sheep in a dream indicates feeling happy and receiving good news, happiness, and many happy occasions in the future. My opinion.Interpretation of a dream about sheep for a single woman: The interpretation of seeing sheep in one dream indicates hope and optimism and we wish you success and receiving a lot of happy news from them. Dreaming about a flock of sheep in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication that the right person will offer himself to her and must accept her. In order to marry her. Seeing a white sheep in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates a close marriage with a suitable and respectable person and you will be very happy with him after marrying him. Seeing a black sheep in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the beginning of a failed romantic relationship that ends in separation without an official engagement. The dream of seeing a stray sheep in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of her relationship with a weak person who cannot bear it. Interpretation of a dream of a sheep for a married woman: The interpretation of a dream of a white or black sheep in a dream about a married woman is evidence of many good and spacious living, increasing money and blessings for children. Seeing a sheep taken from the dead in a dream for a married woman indicates that this dead person needs someone to confirm his health with constant charity, prayer, and ask for a lot of forgiveness. The dream of a sheep being gifted from the husband in a dream to a married woman is evidence of the stability of her marriage and may indicate her imminent pregnancy if she is expecting. Therefore, seeing a married woman buying sheep in a dream is evidence that she has power and that she is the one who manages her home and spends money.

title: Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream, the dream of the Prophet Muhammad

preview.html: Seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream - who teaches the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream - and this dream portends goodness that will prevail for the dreamer. If he is in debt, God will pay his debt to him, and if he falls ill, he will recover, God willing. And whoever sees in a dream the Messenger in a green barren land and what came out of it will benefit people. And seeing him in a place where it is spreading Injustice, this is a sign that disobedience will turn into justice. And whoever sees him in his home, this is a sign of the safety of his household. Seeing the Messenger in a dream pale and emaciated. Seeing the Messenger in a dream pale and thin and with missing limbs, this dream indicates weakness in the religion of a family member. It could be A sign of spreading heresies and committing sins. Whoever sees in a dream the Prophet Muhammad wearing pieces of clothing or a poor person, then this dream indicates weak faith. Whoever sees the Messenger in a dream recovering sick from his illness, this is a sign of integrity between the spouses and may be a sign of reforming the family after corruption. Interpretation of seeing the Messenger riding His mule in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream riding his mule or any type of rider, this indicates that the dreamer will travel to the Blessed Land. Seeing him standing, this is a sign of the dreamer’s uprightness in the affairs of his life. Seeing the Prophet Muhammad reciting the Qur’an in a dream. Whoever heard the voice of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace May God bless him and grant him peace, or reading the Holy Qur’an, or the call to prayer, or mentioning the name of God, or swimming in a dream, is a sign of great distress for its owner. From the dream. Seeing the Messenger eating or drinking in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that our Master Muhammad is feeding him food or sharing his food with him, then this dream indicates that he will obtain money from a lawful source and will never lose it. And whoever sees the Messenger drinking from his cup in a dream, this is good news that God will provide. He must have a good son or marry a good woman of moral character, religion, and good appearance. Seeing the death of the Prophet in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream the death or killing of the Prophet, this dream is a sign of his apostasy from his religion. And whoever sees the Prophet’s funeral in any place, this dream is not good for the dreamer. Interpretation Seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream in the form of light Seeing the Prophet in a dream shows a feeling of happiness and contentment. It also indicates that he carries many signs with meanings that differ according to his body. Seeing our Master Muhammad in a dream is comfort and a state of justice for the dreamer, and God knows best. If he is sick and the Messenger sees him, it means that he will recover in the shortest time, and God knows best. I know. If he is poor and suffers from a lack of livelihood, and the Messenger sees that this indicates goodness and an abundance of money on its way to him. And whoever sees in a dream that the Messenger gives him food or money, this indicates a blessing, an abundance of money, and many good things. Seeing an officer or a soldier in a dream, then this It indicates that he will be victorious over the enemies in a battle he is about to enter. If the dreamer is a farmer and suffers from poverty and his land is barren, neither cultivated nor fertile, then this indicates an increase in the fertility of the land. It also indicates an increase in the crops of his land and that he will produce many crops this year. Interpretation of a dream The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, without seeing a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of the Messenger without seeing him in a dream indicates the success that awaits this single girl in her next life. The dream of the Prophet without seeing a single woman indicates

Whoever heard the voice of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace May God bless him and grant him peace, or reading the Holy Qur’an, or the call to prayer, or mentioning the name of God, or swimming in a dream, is a sign of great distress for its owner. From the dream. Seeing the Messenger eating or drinking in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that our Master Muhammad is feeding him food or sharing his food with him, then this dream indicates that he will obtain money from a lawful source and will never lose it. And whoever sees the Messenger drinking from his cup in a dream, this is good news that God will provide. He must have a good son or marry a good woman of moral character, religion, and good appearance. Seeing the death of the Prophet in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream the death or killing of the Prophet, this dream is a sign of his apostasy from his religion. And whoever sees the Prophet’s funeral in any place, this dream is not good for the dreamer. Interpretation Seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream in the form of light Seeing the Prophet in a dream shows a feeling of happiness and contentment. It also indicates that he carries many signs with meanings that differ according to his body. Seeing our Master Muhammad in a dream is comfort and a state of justice for the dreamer, and God knows best. If he is sick and the Messenger sees him, it means that he will recover in the shortest time, and God knows best. I know. If he is poor and suffers from a lack of livelihood, and the Messenger sees that this indicates goodness and an abundance of money on its way to him. And whoever sees in a dream that the Messenger gives him food or money, this indicates a blessing, an abundance of money, and many good things. Seeing an officer or a soldier in a dream, then this It indicates that he will be victorious over the enemies in a battle he is about to enter. If the dreamer is a farmer and suffers from poverty and his land is barren, neither cultivated nor fertile, then this indicates an increase in the fertility of the land. It also indicates an increase in the crops of his land and that he will produce many crops this year. Interpretation of a dream The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, without seeing a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of the Messenger without seeing him in a dream indicates the success that awaits this single girl in her next life. The dream of the Prophet without seeing a single woman indicates

title: What is the interpretation of a married woman urinating in the open?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream for a single girl: A dream of seeing a single girl urinating in the toilet in a dream is a good dream. This is because it symbolizes the liberation of the dreaming girl from a harmful, useless relationship, and God knows best. Seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream for a single girl is a good sign. On entering the banner in the exams, you will pass them and achieve great success. The dream of urinating in a clean toilet in the dream of an unmarried girl is a good vision. Because it indicates that the single woman will discover everyone who is bad in her life and stay away from him, and God knows best. What if an unmarried girl sees that she is urinating? In a dirty toilet in a dream. This indicates that her behavior is bad and therefore she treats others in an unacceptable way and loses everyone around her, and God knows best. Seeing urinating in the bathroom in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the psychological stability that the dreamer enjoys. When an unmarried girl sees herself She urinates easily in the toilet in a dream. Good news that he will find the job he wants and is looking for. Either an unmarried girl dreams of urinating in and out of the toilet, and a young man enters to urinate and the urine is consistent with each other in the dream. A good vision indicates that he will marry the one he loves and desires, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about urinating on clothes. Interpretation of seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream for a married woman. A married woman lives a luxurious life and enjoys a lot of money, and she sees herself urinating a lot in the toilet. This dream is not good. This is because it indicates that she is reckless and spends money to no avail. She is on her way to poverty, and God knows best. As for a married woman, she dreams that she is urinating in the toilet, and the color of the urine is green, not the natural yellow in the dream. The dream indicates that her life will be filled with goodness, blessings, and livelihood. And if the married woman was suffering from an illness, and she dreamed that she was urinating in the toilet, And the urine was green. This is a good sign for recovery from diseases, and God knows best. But if the color of the urine is darker than the normal color, it is a sign of deteriorating health, and God knows best. And if you see urine in the toilet and it is black in color in the dream, it is a bad vision because it indicates that the dreamer He commits a lot of sins and disobedience and he must repent and fear God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man dreams that he urinates in the toilet easily and without fatigue in a dream. Good skin makes the right decisions in life. Seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream means that you You will be freed from sins and transgressions, and God knows best. A man suffers from aches, pains, and worries and sees himself urinating in a green dream. A good sign for me, because he will overcome all the pain in his life. In the event that he feels tired because of the accumulation of debts from a man, and he dreams that he is urinating in a spacious toilet. In a dream. Good vision because he will pay off debts and feel psychological comfort. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about urinating in the toilet. The meaning of seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream for a pregnant woman and its interpretation. Either a pregnant woman who sees that she is urinating in the toilet and there were many worms in the dream, she will worry.

title: Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
Seeing marriage in a dream for a single or married person always raises many questions in their souls and what this dream shows, so they resort to seeking knowledge of its various connotations according to their social and psychological condition... and this is what we aspire to. We will talk about it in detail inside the Shamloul website. There are many interpretations of seeing a wedding in a dream. What these sayings entail depends on factors such as the prevailing psychological state of the dreamer on earth and the effect of seeing the dream on his psyche. Below we will learn about the different interpretations of this vision: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is marrying a beautiful and charming virgin... this indicates the abundance of goodness that awaits the dreamer... The dream also indicates that the dreamer will achieve all the goals and aspirations that he dreamed of.
ZOE.If the dreamer sees that he is marrying a dead girl, this means that the dreamer will achieve something that he has wanted for a while and thought was impossible to achieve.If an unmarried man sees in a dream that he is marrying his sister, this is a sign that he will visit God’s holy house. Or it may denote in a way A year indicates a travel opportunity for him through which he will achieve many desires and ambitions, or that there is a professional project that he will participate in with his sister. If a married man sees in a dream that his wife has married another person, this is evidence that he will have a lot of money and a lot of sustenance during the period. Coming. If a married man sees that his wife marries her father in a dream, this means that she will receive an inheritance from her family or that there is a livelihood that will come to her without hardship or fatigue. If an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying someone who is already married, this means that she will face crises and obstacles. Bitter in life. But if the person does not know her, this means that she will be engaged or married soon. Important interpretations of seeing a wedding in a dream There are many interpretations of the dream of marriage in a dream, and there are many important clues that the dreamer must be aware of when searching for interpretations of this dream, the most important of which are: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has married a stranger she does not know, this means that she will obtain the wishes she made and achieve many successes in her life. But if she sees that she is marrying someone to whom she is emotionally attached, this indicates that she is not married to him and they will face some problems and difficulties. In completing it. But once these trials are over, you will get married, God willing. Marriage in general is a sign of God’s care, God’s generosity, and mercy for the dreamer...and his standing with him in times of crises. An unmarried young man marrying a Jewish woman in a dream shows that he is committing many sins in his life. But regarding that Dreaming of marrying a Christian woman, this indicates that he has committed many forbidden things and believes in matters of magic and sorcery. In general, marrying a Christian or Jewish girl is not an annoying matter, but rather it is an indication to the dreamer that he is deviating from the straight path... and that he has a desire to be open to what is forbidden or abnormal. Seeing marriage in a dream can also be interpreted as a person’s religious commitment and walking the straight path...or being psychologically compatible

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a bullet wound in the leg in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a bullet wound in the leg in a dream, through the books of leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions and experts in the sciences of interpretation. In this article, we have put together for you what is the interpretation of seeing yourself divorced in a dream for unmarried, married or pregnant women, as well as for men. If you are interested in knowing the interpretation of this dream in particular, just go ahead. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman playing with a ball on her leg? Seeing a cat on her leg in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she has crossed the wrong path and may be going through a failed romantic relationship. Seeing a wound A bullet in a dream means that the woman was indifferent and was bleeding profusely. Interpretation of a dream about a man being injured in a dream: A camel is one of the visions that indicate that she will get a suitable husband for her. Also, seeing someone shooting her in a dream indicates backbiting, gossip, and some bad words that It affects her hearing. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman injured in her leg? Shooting a married woman in a complete dream in the old days is evidence that she is going through some troubles and problems that cause her a lot of stress. A woman who sees her husband injured in the leg in a dream It is a message from God that her husband will be harmed and she must be careful and careful. Seeing gunshots in a dream full of women generally indicates bad thoughts that you are having because of some false words that you hear. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman injured in her leg? Seeing a pregnant woman injured in her entire leg In a dream, it does not mean eternal evil, but rather indicates that she will overcome all difficult stages. Seeing a fetus shot in a dream also indicates envy, closeness to God, remembrance, and psychological and moral calm. What is the interpretation of seeing a man wounded by a bullet in his leg? Seeing a full bullet wound in a dream, and the dreamer’s leg being hit and blood dripping, means that he will be hurt and lost during this period. Also, seeing a full bullet wound in the thigh in a dream is a sign of a problem and troubles that the dreamer is going through, and the flow of blood means relief from distress. Interpretation of a man He was shot in the arm in the back in a dream. Kamel indicates that the man has been betrayed and deceived by some of those close to him, so he must be prevented. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream. The bracelet or the bracelet has many and varied interpretations, and these interpretations certainly differ from the single to the married and the pregnant woman, and the jurists warned against wearing two bracelets in a dream, by following the evidence written in the article. Do you know what What is the reason for the warning? Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Gold bracelet in a dream. What you do not know about the interpretation of dreaming of a gold bracelet in a dream, you will find it in the interpretation of the following visions: Dreaming of a gold bracelet is typical of an unemployed fortune teller: It indicates fruitful work, a lot of money, and a life completely far from stagnation and failure that The dreamer complained about him in the past, so his desire to find a job will come true soon. Seeing a gold bracelet in a student’s dream: It indicates the uniqueness and different and honorable success that this student will achieve in reality. Seeing a gold bracelet in a dream: It is interpreted by the fulfillment of desires . For example, if a bachelor finds a golden bracelet, and in the same vision he sees a beautiful girl and gives her the bracelet he found at the beginning of the dream, this means that he wished to start a family, get married and have children. Children, and her wish will come true, God willing. Stealing a gold bracelet in a dream: indicates anxiety and joy that turn into worries and sorrows. In a clearer sense, if an unmarried woman sees that the bracelet she bought has been stolen, then this is her marriage, which she was happy with, but haters will be a reason not to to do that. Complete it, and if the employee sees a stolen bracelet in the dream, he will find many problems at work and will eventually quit because of some bad people. Receiving a gold bracelet from a dead person in a dream: It shows that hope and optimism are approaching the dreamer’s life, as he will get married soon if he hopes for success, He will put his hand into a job opportunity that will get him out of the prison of poverty in which he lives. Or you will get a lot of money from your current job. A gold bracelet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin gave two interpretations of the golden bracelet, noting that they are two different interpretations according to the gender of the dreamer, as he said that seeing the golden bracelet in a woman’s dream is interpreted with joyful meanings such as the following visions: Check A bright and shiny gold bracelet: It may indicate fame and excellent success in study or work or a successful marriage with a well-known person who has clear activities in society. Check out a gold bracelet studded with prominent diamonds: It is interpreted as a great opportunity or great success, the god may receive a great blessing. From God who lives hidden because of her in her life, such as the blessing of money, health, or the blessing of life. Check out a gold-encrusted bracelet studded with small natural stones: indicates profits from work or that the dreamer is earning from a special project that he created in the past and it is time to collect money through it. As for the interpretation of the bracelet in a man’s dream, it is completely different, and the meaning also varies depending on the vision, as follows: Check a large, heavy gold bracelet: Does it indicate the burden of responsibilities that the person does not know about?

title: Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of someone you love and want to marry

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about your engagement to someone you love: Interpretation of dreams about getting engaged to someone you love Interpretation of dreams about getting engaged to someone you love. There is no doubt that every girl dreams of her engagement day, because she wants to be happy like all the girls who preceded her engagement and engagement. Spending happy days, so every girl sometimes dreams of that day with fear and tension. Because she wants this day to pass in peace and quiet, so the subconscious mind works and transforms to appear in the dream in which the girl dreams of engaging with someone she loves or anyone else, so we will talk today on the site Various interpretations of the dream of getting engaged to someone you love. We hope that this article will be liked by all our esteemed visitors. Interpretation of seeing someone you love getting engaged to another person in a dream for a single woman: If a girl dreams that her lover is engaged to another girl, this means that her relationship with her lover will develop into marriage. Ibn Sirin interprets Also this vision that the girl is on the wrong path and needs to rethink her affairs. This vision also shows that she is linked to a lying and irresponsible person who does not intend to marry her, and there are some commentators who have confirmed that this vision is evidence that this girl will get married soon. But if The girl saw that her former fiancé was engaged to another girl, this indicates that the girl thinks a lot about her past life and that her heart is still attached to this person. Interpretation of seeing the engagement of someone she loves with another person in a dream for a man: Getting engaged in a man’s dream is evidence that he will achieve his dreams and taste the most beautiful The pleasures of life. This is because seeing an engagement in a man’s dream shows his desire to achieve his goals, but if a man sees that the girl he loves is engaged to someone else, this indicates his disappointment in achieving what he wants. And if a man sees in his dream that he is proposing to a beautiful girl for engagement, If The poor man saw that he was engaged in a dream, this may indicate that his deadline is approaching, as engagement in a man’s dream is completely different from the engagement of girls, as if a man sees in his dream that he is engaged to an unmarried girl and this indicates that he will get a big promotion at work. And if His engagement was beautiful, cheerful, and full of joy and happiness. This indicates his freedom from the worries and pressures that surround him. But if the dreamer sees that he is proposing to an ugly girl, this indicates distress, stress, and a large number of debts to which the dreamer is exposed. Interpretation of witnessing the engagement of someone you love to another person in A dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that someone is proposing to her in a dream, this indicates the good and abundant income that she and her husband will receive. But if she sees that the person she was in a relationship with before her marriage is in a relationship with another girl, this indicates that she She thinks a lot about her past life. But if she sees that she is engaged to a dead person, this also indicates goodness and goodness

But if she sees that the person she was in a relationship with before her marriage is in a relationship with another girl, this indicates that she She thinks a lot about her past life. But if she sees that she is engaged to a dead person, this also indicates goodness and goodness
